summary: Critical component shortage for Gamma; supplier delays increased lead times and backorders.
Supplier partial recovery; constraints easing but not fully resolved.
Aggressive discount campaign on Beta drove bookings up, ASP down, and margin compression.
Two enterprise customers paused renewals for ServicesPlus; churn increased and bookings fell.
EUR strengthened versus USD; reported USD revenue increased versus local-currency performance.
Late allocations and cloud spend true-up impacted opex for select regions and cost centers.
